text: Itzik Kala Itzik Kala () is an Israeli singer of Kurdish Jewish descent who sings in Aramaic, Kurdish and Hebrew. He has released over 30 studio albums. He is married to Ziona Kala. == References == Category:Israeli Jews Category:Israeli singers Category:Israeli people of Kurdish-Jewish descent Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Itzik Kala
